scope.title: Call To Action
scope.description: Call to action links are visually distinct instructions to users designed to provoke an immediate response using verbs such as 'call now' or 'find out more'.

data.title: Call To Action
data.description: Call to action links are visually distinct instructions to users designed to provoke an immediate response using verbs such as 'call now' or 'find out more'.
